info.title: Qdrant API

get.description:
Get cluster status info

Get information about the current state and composition of the cluster

time.description: Time spent to process this request

post.summary: Tries to recover current peer Raft state.
post.description: Tries to recover current peer Raft state.

time.description: Time spent to process this request

consensus_thread_status.description: Status of the thread that executes raft consensus

message_send_failures.description: Consequent failures of message send operations in consensus by peer address. On the first success to send to that peer - entry is removed from this hashmap.

peers.description: Peers composition of the cluster with main information

ClusterStatus.description: Information about current cluster status and structure

ConsensusThreadStatus.description: Information about current consensus thread status

time.description: Time spent to process this request

MessageSendErrors.description: Message send failures for a particular peer

PeerInfo.description: Information of a peer in the cluster

RaftInfo.description: Summary information about the current raft state

commit.description: The index of the latest committed (finalized) operation that this peer is aware of.

is_voter.description: Is this peer a voter or a learner

pending_operations.description: Number of consensus operations pending to be applied on this peer

role.description: Role of this peer in the current term

term.description: Raft divides time into terms of arbitrary length, each beginning with an election. If a candidate wins the election, it remains the leader for the rest of the term. The term number increases monotonically. Each server stores the current term number which is also exchanged in every communication.

StateRole.description: Role of the peer in the consensus

externalDocs.description: Find out more about Qdrant applications and demo
